trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class creates an attribute scoped query (ASQ) control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> 類別會建立屬性範圍的查詢 (Attribute Scoped Query，ASQ) 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This control is used with a search request to force the query to be based on a specific DN-valued attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項將與搜尋要求搭配使用，以根據特定的 DN 值屬性強制執行查詢。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name on which the query is based.
trans-unit.target: 查詢所依據的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> class using the specified attribute name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> 建構函式使用指定的屬性名稱，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.AttributeName" /> property gets or sets the attribute name on which the search query is based.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.AttributeName" /> 屬性會取得或設定搜尋查詢所依據的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name on which the search query is based.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋查詢所依據的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.GetValue" /> method returns the binary representation of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl.GetValue" /> 方法會傳回 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AsqRequestControl" /> 的二進位表示。
